short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells you about a boardgame on /r/boardgames

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hover over a board game name written in bold and a little info window will appear at the top right of the page for that game.

Driven by the BoardGameGeek API. Only works on a URL that starts with https://www.reddit.com/r/boardgames/.
